official_title: A bill to amend the boundary of the Harpers Ferry National Historical Park to include Short Hill in Loudoun County, Virginia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the boundary of the Harpers Ferry National Historical Park to include Short Hill in Loudoun County, Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to amend the boundary of the Harpers Ferry National Historical Park to include Short Hill in Loudoun County, Virginia, and for other purposes.
